lines.text:
[singing]
Mama's wittle baby woves wabbit, wabbit, Mama's wittle baby woves wabbit stew!

[inside Elmer's basket]
Eh, what's up, Doc? What's in the basket?
A wabbit. I'm gonna make a wabbit stew.
Rabbit? Mmm, mmm! Love it, love it!
[Jumps out of basket and jumps excitedly in front of Elmer]
Hey, Lemme see the rabbit, mister! Can I see the rabbit, Huh? Please let me see the rabbit!
Awright.
[Bugs goes inside basket, comes out other side]
No rabbit in there, Doc! You've been robbed!
No wabbit? Well, I...
[Elmer crawls into basket, Bugs carries basket]

[singing]
Mama's little baby loves rabbit, rabbit, mama's little baby loves rabbit stew!
Ooh, you twickster! You're the wabbit!

[as Dr. Killpatient]
Tell me, Mr. Fudd. Do you have any rabbit inclinations?
Well, no.
What's two times two?
Four.
Three times three?
Six.
Ah-ha! Multiplying! Yep, you're even beginning to look like a rabbit.

[after Elmer gets "contaminated", he tries to take a shower, but no water comes out and it is then revealed that Bugs Bunny is the shower head]
Goigle, goigle. Why don'tcha pay your water bill, doc?
[last lines]

[Bugs is chased out of Elmer's home, but stops him in his tracks]
Hey, wait a minute. Wait a minute. Look, the people out there in the audience - the lady there with the long ears. They're getting longer all the time. And the guy back there in the seventeenth row with the cute tomato - he's gettin' all fuzzy. Yeah, they've got it. Everybody out there's got rabbititus! Yaah!

[Elmer storms back into the house]
Oh, Margaret, what a dope. That was just a gag, of course. You folks haven't got rabbititus. Why, if you had rabbititus, you'd see red and yellow spots before your eyes.

[red and yellow spots appear on the screen]
Yeah, that's right. And then they'd start swirling and swirling around.
[the spots start swirling rapidly]
And then suddenly, everything would go black!
[screen immediately fades to black. Bugs is heard laughing]

[is about to escape, but stops himself]
Uh-oh. Wait a minute. This set-up's too good. I just can't leave. I gotta go back and heckle that character.
Oh, this is tewwible. Trapped with a cwazy, contaminated wabbit.
Oh, now doc. Don't get yourself in a dither. How do you know I'm contaminated? I haven't got no symptoms. You don't see no spots before my eyes, do you?
[Spots appear before Bugs' eyes]
Oh, gwacious!
My tongue ain't coated. See?
[Sticks out his tongue; it has a small overcoat on]
Oh, my gwacious!
I don't throw fits.
[Starts throwing fits]
Oh, gwacious! Oh, my!
[Bugs advances towards Elmer like the Frankenstein monster; Elmer backs against a wall]
No, siree. Never felt better in my life. I'm full of pep.
[Grabs Elmer's hand and starts dancing with him]
Well yes, yes. Well all reet. C'mon, Jackson. Cut yourself a slice of rug.
Oh, let go of my hand, you cwazy wabbit! Oh, now you've done it. You've contaminated me! Oh, ho-ho-ho-ho!

[in disguise]
I'm Dr. Killpatient from the Board of Health. Where's the contaminated rabbit at?
Oh, I'm gweatwy gwatified to see you, Doctor.
Okay, okay, where's he at?
He's wight in here, some pwace.

[Enters a room and closes the door]
Hmm. Mmm-hmm. Hmm. Yes? Mmm.
[Opens door]
Mr. Fudd, come in a minute, please.
[They enter the room; it's painted with colored spots]
Oh! Oh, my gwacious!

[Hiding the buckets of paint]
Why, what's the matter, Fudd?
Spots! I see spots before my eyes!
Spots? Mmm, that's bad. Spots, Mmm. Foist symptom of rabittitus.

[as Dr. Kilpatient]
Okay Doc let me test your reflexes,
[hits his knee with a mallet]
first this one,
[hits his other knee]
than that one, this one, that one, this one, that one
[Bugs and Elmer go off into a Russian Dance]
Hey!

[suddenly realizing]
Hey you're not a doctor you're that scwewy wabbit!

[continues dancing]
Hey!
[Elmer whips out a shotgun and shoots at him]
Hey!,Hey!,Hey!
[runs away]
